==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|ふ|つう|わ|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
From {{etyl|cmn|ja|sort=ふつうわ}} {{zh-l|普通話|pǔtōnghuà|common speech}}.

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|ふつうわ|プートンファ|プートンホワ}}

# The [[Mandarin]] Chinese language, [[Putonghua]]

====Synonyms====
* {{ja-r|北京語|ペキンご}}

====Usage notes====
* This official term is a borrowing from Mandarin, but is not often used in speech as it sounds like {{m|ja|普通|普通は|tr=futsū wa|[[normally]], [[usually]]}}. Consequently, {{m|ja|北京語|tr=pekingo}} is more commonly used instead, which also has the meaning of “[[Beijing]] language/dialect”. Alternatively, approximations of Mandarin pronunciations are used, e.g. {{ja-r|プートンファ}} or {{ja-r|プートンホワ}}.

[[Category:ja:Languages|ふつうわ]]
